channel.title: Any one has an idea?
channel.description: I was asking my self , how may i make a VPS ? I would make a vps and make my server by it.

item.title: Any one has an idea?
item.dc:creator: @D3i7y D3i7y
item.description:
@D3i7y wrote:

i use alienvps but really if you are unsure about using the command line i would suggest getting a windows vps. you can find various tutorials on the forums for ubuntu in the tutorial section. i am not sure a good place to get windows vps besides swvps or my favorite amazon aws. but both of these will take your server down with a single complaint.

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: Any one has an idea?
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

I cleaned up the thread, stop being douche bags. He asked a legitimate question… If you can’t answer the question there’s no reason for you to post in the topic.

Hatem, I’m assuming you’re asking how to get a VPS, I know you mentioned English isn’t your first language; Start off by going to a site to buy a VPS. I have personally used linode and alienvps. Linode is a bit more expensive but it has better up time, alienvps is quite a bit cheaper and I’d say it could probably handle just about anything you need to do for right now.

Read full topic
